form.name: positive_malaria_test
form.page_subtitle: ANC Diagnostic: ANC Malaria> Positive Malaria Test

field.name: Does the client have the following?
Severe or Complicated Malaria
field.options: Persistent vomiting |Convulsions | Altered consciousness | Dark, coca-coloured urine | Persistent fever ≥ 39C | Prostration |Jaundice |Severe pallor |Shock |Bleeding| Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated Malaria
field.options: Fever or history of fever present within the last 2-3 days | Chills | Rigor (shivering) | Headache | Body and joint pain | Nausea with or without vomiting | Loss of appetite | Sweating | Bitterness in the mouth | Click here to take action
